title: [Client] Low Priority Queue is going higher than 20

embed.description: Image low q times are crazy hosted in imgbb.com

body:
So I just got into the low priority queue for 20min. At around 15mins it started to increase the time. I wasn't paying attention to the client, I had it on my second monitor, because I was playing another game on my main monitor. I now have to wait 18mins and already waited 32. 
The Low Priority Queue is already a total time waste, but waiting 50 or even longer is just crazy. Rito pls fix.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
Sincerely, A guy who is an expert on being in a low priority queue for too many times.

replies.body: Heya, this can happen if your connection lost sync to matchmaking.  Lower priority queue is good at catching what could have been another potential leave, so it sounds like you might still be having some network issues.  If you haven't already, I highly recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your settings.
